# Generated by Pod::WikiDoc version 0.18

=pod

=head1 NAME

CPAN::Reporter::History - Read or write a CPAN::Reporter history log

=head1 VERSION

This documentation refers to version 1.04

=head1 DESCRIPTION

Currently, all methods are private.  Future versions may add methods to
allow programs outside CPAN::Reporter to query a CPAN::Reporter
history file.

=head1 SEE ALSO

=over

=item *

L<CPAN::Reporter>

=item *

L<CPAN::Reporter::FAQ>

=back
